title: Job interviews for graduate teachers. Part 2 (TEFC)
creator_credit: Educational Development Unit, Chisholm Institute of Technology
brief_description: This video, the second in a series of two, features two complete yet contrasting interviews for analysis and discussion. Points of note are highlighted at the end of each interview. The first interview is held in an atmosphere which is congenial and supportive, the second in conditions that are cool and detached.
